page.title: 02S.HEDINGHAM A604 AND TRAFFIC
page.content: Sible Hedingham would not be as it is with out{traffic.}The{A604}runs through the village,and is very busy carrying all forms of transport. Many heavy lorries use the road to reach the East Coast Docks. Our school road is narrow, and is busy in the afternoons as mothers come to collect their children. There is'nt a footpath and there is concern about this. There is a dairy called Tanners and many milk lorries use School Road. When Rippers and Tanners finish work the{A604}gets busy, and there have been several accidents. There are sometimes jams, particularly in the summer because of seaside{traffic.} It's mostly quiet in Sible Hedingham during the day away from the{A604.}
